website_summaries.verdict: The moderately priced Acer Aspire E5-573G-7034 is a desktop-replacement laptop that offers lots of storage and memory, as well as a solid feature set.
cons: Mediocre display, with narrow viewing angles

customer_reviews.title: I think it is fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for over a year and a half and I have no complaints. I think it is fantastic for the price! It plays the games I like with no problem, although the more graphics-intensive games need to have some settings turned down to allow for better performance. But I wasn't in the market for a gaming laptop so I wasn't expecting it to perform like one :)
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Worked for awhile.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for college. Lasted just shy of 4 years before the hard drive crapped out and it crashed altogether. That wasn't before I began having issues with it having clicking noises, freezing up, lagging, and the battery only lasting an hour on a full charge, and getting very hot despite being on a cool hard surface. Worked well up until that point though.
customer_reviews.author: Kriss W

customer_reviews.title: Lucky to get this one before it ran out!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the 10052 laptops I've ever had, this is the one for me. Acer wins in quality, price, and longevity. The only issue with any computer you buy that you run into is bloatware, which is an easy fix for anyone with some expertise. I continue to buy Acer because in comparison an Asus or comparable name is often up to 30% more for the same parts! I hope that Acer continues to offer premium products for less than the more established brands. The reason I chose this one is because it has a very solid dedicated graphics card and RAM.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cinco

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today, the startup time is insanely fast. Had to delete quite a bit of bloat ware installed on the laptop. Also if your router does not support 802.11ac , you can expect extremely slow internet speeds as my router was not 802.11ac although I temporally solved the problem by using a Ethernet cable instead of wifi. Now for gaming, this runs incredibly well, being able to run Highest settings in several games such as Warframe,BL2,TF2. Have not tested in AAA games
customer_reviews.author: Kratos Heart

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop. I bought it maybe two years ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. I bought it maybe two years ago now and it is still in fantastic condition, even after much dropping. The white inside actually had me worried it would discolor or stain over time but after two years of use there's barely any noticeable discoloration on it, even where my wrist often rubbed against it from typing and using the touch pad.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am a software engineer with a long history of using (and abusing) my computers, and I've been very pleased with this one. Nice specs, handsome aesthetics, good price. Monitor is a little disappointing, but really can't complain in light of the specs for this machine. Upgrading the memory is also a bit of a pain, but most people wouldn't need to do that anyway. Still, really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop. Can play games on it for the people asking, it does take awhile to log in sometimes. Juse wish it had a back-lit keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: but a great laptop. Responsive
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought, but a great laptop. Responsive, great size screen, nice look, and overall lightweight laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kaye

customer_reviews.title: good laptop,best performance,for the price it is worth it
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is awsome.Good performance never stucks. For the money i got it, this is definitely worth it.i definitely recommend it ,only problem is low resolution, the low resolution doesnt let you see the screen good,it was the best if it was full-HD The screen is small compared to the size of laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Pepkolaj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful and a bang for the buck laptop that is powerful and well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: nick t

customer_reviews.title: It's good. Not amazing
customer_reviews.text: It's good. Not amazing, but it is good. I thought the HDMI plug was an output, allowing me to play my PS4 on it, but its an input. That was kind of lame, but the laptop itself is fast and effective. Terrible mouse pad, though. Definitely buy a mouse with the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, runs new batman and far cry perfectly after i installed ssd.
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great laptop that runs games smoothly. In my opinion the best gaming laptop for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Lopez Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of ad on software that has to be weeded through. Does come with a Windows 10 free upgrade. Very fast and sleek machine. Very lite and thin. Overall very satisfied with this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5 but...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great laptop that has handled anything I have thrown at it without getting too hot. The speakers arn't the best but are acceptable. It also doesn't come with a disk drive whitch I would have liked but the pros definitely out way the cons
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Terry

customer_reviews.title: Really happy I decided to buy this
customer_reviews.text: A really good product. For the price, I doubt you can get anything better. And it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kunal Kapoor

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the
customer_reviews.text: Right what I was expected. Great laptop for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially not impressed due to the slow loading on wifi for this laptop, but now I'm changing my review. I had to contact MS Support and was even elevated to a Level 2 tech because my browser would not load https websites and wifi was generally slow and choppy. After upgrading the Wireless adapter (Qualcomm released an updated driver for Windows 10 64-bit on 8/25/15) this thing is flying through the "internets" with the greatest of ease.
customer_reviews.author: David Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: GET it if you looking for a average gamer,
customer_reviews.text: I like it but sometimes when gaming it gives my lag spikes, but that is a little rare. I was also very disappointed to hear this is a INTEL graphics card, the prosseser it Nvidia , and you have to keep in mind the 8 Gb storage, but I cant really say anything because when I got it is was just $500. Oh yeah also the look to this computer is SWEET
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great dealand very fast. I bought two.My husband uses his at work and my son uses his at school. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect Minecraft to run well on this laptop unless you use the integrated GPU.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonmorr

customer_reviews.title: Not a good investment
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is a waste of money. The moment I went to go set everything up, it crashed and rebooted. At first, I set that aside as a fluke, because the graphics for the game I play were wonderful and it was running fast. However, as time passed, it only got worse. Programs and apps constantly freeze and close, refuse to open, won't install or uninstall, and it's already slowed down a ton. Windows 8 is a useless operating system, as well. Please spend your money on something more worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: fast computer but
customer_reviews.text: The computer is well made and fast but within the first day I had it ive had graphics card issues. The screen flashes black and then comes back and says graphics driver crashed and has recovered. This is very annoying as whatever you are doing is interrupted until its done recovering. computer freezes often, having to hold the power button until it shuts off. do not buy this computer
customer_reviews.author: Otto Ward

customer_reviews.title: Absolute trash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it could connect to the internet however that is not the case. At first I thought this was a good deal for a good product but I was met with the worst internet connectivity, very poor ventilation, and probably the worst screen glare I've ever experienced. Horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Max Hodson

customer_reviews.title: Blatant false advertising
customer_reviews.text: The computer is actually ok but the specs are false advertising. Just so you know, if you are thinking of buying this one because of the ssd know that there isn't one. All they did was partition the 1tb hdd.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Huge laptop issue.
customer_reviews.text: Don't purchase this laptop unless you have a router that can work with AC 5ghz. I have a brand new verizon fios router and it is not compability with this laptop. Because of this the download speed is 5 Mbps instead of 60. Do yourself a favor and don't buy it unless you're sure your router can support it. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Kasumovic
